CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ISBLANK(Channel_Lead__c), RecordTypeId = '012A0000000TWRX', OR(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Opened'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Contacted'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Assign to Channel Partner') ), OR( $User.Id = Account_Executive__c, $User.Id = Account_Play_Owner__c, $User.Id = Inside_Sales_Manager__c , $User.Id = Inside_Sales_Rep__c, $User.Id = Technical_Sales_Rep__c , $User.Id = Solution_Specialist__c) ) , HYPERLINK('/apex/CMAP_RouteAccountPlay?APId='+Id, IMAGE('resource/1362106041000/CMAP_RouteToChannel', 'RouteToChannelButton'),'_parent'), "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Routing Segment Account Play to Channel
CustomField.label: Route to Channel
